metadata.title: CVE-2025-21171 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability: Buffer overrun in Convert.TryToHexString.An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted requestto the vulnerable web server.

criterions.comment: dotnet7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'see notes').
